summary: I was deleting pictures when suddenly I found this screenshot. It was from an instagram page of normies memes and stuff, quite...
body:
I was deleting pictures when suddenly I found this screenshot. It was from an instagram page of normies memes and stuff, quite known in this country. When I looked at the bottom right photo…

I fucking lost it

Wasn’t expecting it honestly

(The text in the image says “Best Friend’s International Day”)

tags: i send this my gc and thought yall would like it too so here you go
summary:
Dan's 12 hour lifestream
I want Dan to make a 12 hour charity steam as well and at some point Phil comes in to ask what he...
body:
Dan’s 12 hour lifestream

I want Dan to make a 12 hour charity steam as well and at some point Phil comes in to ask what he should cook for them and, out of habit, pecks dan on his lips. Both get red and giggly and Phil simply tells him he’ll bring the food once it’s done and leaves.

Dan still burning red tries to get back to the topic he rambled about earlier but being totally confused and stuttery. Of course the chat is going crazy at that point and Dan is stuck with it, cause he is supposed to stay online.

Once Phil gets back he just laughes at Dan being like ‘you’re not over this, are you?’. Dan is just frozen so Phil takes over the show. He sits down next to Dan, eating and explaining how he had seen a weird thing on Amazon and ordered it so we shall look for his next video. He starts telling some other Phil style stories happening to him that week, neither acknowledging Dan nor the chat.

When he’s finished eating he just sets a hand on Dans thingh gripping reassuringly giving him another peck on the temple shrugging as if he said 'it doesn’t matter now anyways’. He tells Dan to stop being boring and tell a story. Phil takes both empty plates and leaves.

And at that Dan just bursts out 'oh well fuck it yes we’re a thing. are you happy now?? let’s get back to this dumb music discussion: so as i said I listened to….’

And one can only hear phil chuckling from the kitchen.

Once phil is done with the dishes and some work stuff several hours later, he joins the stream again and they both don’t acknowledge anything, being their usual stream persona with quick witted banter and fond smiles talking about this and that.

In the end Dan counts down 12 hours, tells how much he raised being thankful and proud, telling again how much this means to him and phil is like 'ok danyul, we know. I am hungry make me food’. Dan snickers knowing it’s their sign for I need some love come fuck me and leaves the chat.

And that’s my headcanon for today my loves. (The story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this production are fictitious. No identification with actual persons (living or deceased), places, buildings, and products is intended or should be inferred.)

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: I’m sure Dan has his own money and is able to support himself during his break. Why would that be Phil’s responsibility, unless...
question: I’m sure Dan has his own money and is able to support himself during his break. Why would that be Phil’s responsibility, unless you think they are a couple? Dan was probably making more money off youtube than Phil for years, but from what I hear from most youtubers these days youtube isn’t their main source of income. Felix uploads every day and has millions of subscribers and views and has said he makes more money selling merch than from ad revenue
answer:
They’re roommates. So presumably, they share half the expenses. And so, for example, if your roommate loses their job, and isn’t making money, you might pick up their half for a couple months while they figure it out. That has nothing to do with their relationship status.

But, like I said, I can’t claim to know their financial situation. They likely do make more money from IRL than from Phil’s YouTube channel. And Dan likely is still pulling a profit from somewhere. But he can’t possibly be bringing in as much income as he used to, because he isn’t posting YouTube videos anymore. So Phil might be posting more frequently partly because he wants to, and partly to compensate.

At the end of the day though, this is just my own thought process, not fact, and I could be dead wrong. Because I don’t actually know fuck all about their finances. Nor do I want to, because that’s not my business.

blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: do you think dan and phil are doing youtube for the money? Like obviously to some extent they HAVE to you know, to make a living...
question: do you think dan and phil are doing youtube for the money? Like obviously to some extent they HAVE to you know, to make a living but like do you think the sole reason of them uploading (or at least phil) is to make (even more) money?
answer:
I think part of the reason Phil is uploading so frequently right now probably has to do with the fact that they still have bills and rent to pay, and somebody has to pull an income for that to happen. It’s not Dan, it’s not the gaming channel, so it kind of has to be Phil.

Of course, I can’t claim to know their financial situation. I don’t know how much, or how often they get paid, and I don’t know specifically where that money comes from. And it’s not my business regardless. But I would venture to guess that even if Dan and Phil are rich, they probably aren’t “never have to work again a day in my life” rich. They’re both still young in the grand scheme of things, and you burn through a whole heck of a lot of money in a lifetime. So while they might have a good savings, and good investments, they most likely do still need to bring in a pay check in order to pay their bills and shit.

Back to your question, do I think it’s the sole reason? No. I think YouTube is still something Phil finds some enjoyment in doing. So while money may be a factor, I don’t think it’s the only driving force.

summary: I’ll say it since no one else has. I only ever subscribed to Amazingphil for the joint content with Dan. I don’t even ship them...
question: I’ll say it since no one else has. I only ever subscribed to Amazingphil for the joint content with Dan. I don’t even ship them but without Dan his videos are just boring imo. I can’t be the only one who thinks this.
answer: I would place money on the bet that you’re not alone on that one. A lot of people, myself included, found Phil via Dan in the first place. For me personally, I found him through Dan, subscribed, and sort of grew to enjoy his solo content over time. But there’s definitely a chunk of people out there who subscribed to Phil for Dan, and now that Dan is gone, they see no reason to stay subscribed to Phil, in a sense.

body:
I’m Striking

I know I’m not a big blog, but this harassing Dan has to stop. I’m not going to post anymore until the phandom chills out. Dan is focusing on himself for once in his life and we can’t leave him alone. I am ashamed to call myself a member of the phandom. I ask other blogs to do the same if we don’t post or reblog demon phanies stuff then they will stop. If we don’t post at all maybe they will realize we aren’t going to be a part of this load of toxic crap anymore.

I’m Striking

I know I’m not a big blog, but this harassing Dan has to stop. I’m not going to post anymore until the phandom chills out. Dan is focusing on himself for once in his life and we can’t leave him alone. I am ashamed to call myself a member of the phandom. I ask other blogs to do the same if we don’t post or reblog demon phanies stuff then they will stop. If we don’t post at all maybe they will realize we aren’t going to be a part of this load of toxic crap anymore.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

question: re: phil talking about smut. weirdthingsphanniessay(.)tumblr(.)com/post/180040772482/hey-i-didnt-watch-dnps-latest-liveshow-but-i
answer:
So here are the two asks from @weirdthingsphanniessay that are linked:

It looks like this was said in a liveshow last November. I wasn’t really paying much attention to them this year and don’t think I have seen the actual video, but here is information on the source for “don’t write Phil smut.” Now we just need the source for Phil saying he was OK with fan fiction and shipping that the other anon mentioned.

summary: strange how no one usually mentions phil saying he's ok with shippy fanfiction/fanart, but instead they quote what dan said in...
question: strange how no one usually mentions phil saying he's ok with shippy fanfiction/fanart, but instead they quote what dan said in his "I will go down with this ship" video. wish your other anon could tell what live show that was tho, I couldn't find any mentions of him saying that on IDB
answer: That does seem like something IDB would go out of their way to point out. Previous anon: which liveshow was this?
